resource_dependency.stockDatabaseSchema: Create a database named 'stocks' with tables: stocks(stock_id, symbol, name, sector, industry, market_cap, pe_ratio), prices(price_id, stock_id, date, open, close, high, low, volume), financials(financial_id, stock_id, revenue, net_income, eps, dividend_yield, quarter_end_date).

function: Allow users to search for stocks by entering either a stock code or name.
static_description: A centered search bar with a magnifying glass icon on the left side, placeholder text 'Enter stock code or name', navy-colored border and text input field against a white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking inside the search box focuses it for text entry.
Pressing Enter after typing initiates the search query using the entered value.

resource_dependency.stockSummaryAPI: Integration with a real-time stock summary API that returns current price, daily change percentage, market cap, P/E ratio, and sector information based on stock symbol.

function: Display summarized key information about the selected stock.
static_description: A card-style container showing stock name, symbol, sector, latest price, percent change, and market capitalization. Background remains white with navy text and borders.

resource_dependency.reportGenerationEngine: An internal engine or third-party tool capable of dynamically compiling user-selected data into structured reports in various formats such as PDF, DOCX, or HTML.

function: Generate customized stock reports based on user-defined parameters including format and content selections.
static_description: Not directly visible but operates behind the scenes when triggered by user actions; displays loading indicator during processing until complete.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon clicking the 'Generate Report' button, the system begins compiling the selected data into the chosen report format.

function: Provide users with options to choose their preferred output format for generated reports.
static_description: Dropdown menu labeled 'Select Format', containing three selectable items: PDF, Word Document, and HTML. Navy-themed styling with white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking opens/closes the dropdown list revealing available format choices.
Selecting an item from the list updates the selected format and closes the dropdown.

function: Enable users to customize which sections appear in the generated report.
static_description: Group of checkboxes arranged vertically under a heading 'Choose Content'. Each checkbox corresponds to a different section type. All elements styled with navy color theme over white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Toggling any checkbox selects or deselects the associated content section for inclusion in the final report.

function: Show essential identifying details about the selected stock entity.
static_description: Section titled 'Basic Information' displaying company logo placeholder alongside listed fields in tabular form. White background with navy headers and text.

resource_dependency.trendChartLibrary: Integrate Chart.js library for rendering interactive line charts.
resource_dependency.marketTrendDataEndpoint: Connect to time-series endpoint returning historical closing prices grouped by date range (daily/weekly/monthly) for plotting.

function: Visualize historical performance trends of the selected stock through graphical representations.
static_description: Interactive chart area titled 'Market Trends' showing dynamic line graph of past performance. Uses navy axes labels and grid lines against a white canvas.

interaction_and_states.description: Hovering over points reveals tooltip with exact date and price values.

resource_dependency.financialDataTableSchema: Table columns: Quarter End Date, Revenue ($M), Net Income ($M), Earnings Per Share (EPS), Dividend Yield (%).
resource_dependency.financialDataSourceAPI: External API providing quarterly financial statements including revenue, net income, EPS, and dividend yield per stock.

function: Fetch and present financial metrics relevant to evaluating the stockâ€™s fiscal health.
static_description: Tabular view titled 'Financial Data' listing recent quarters along with respective financial figures. Styled with alternating row colors, navy header rows, and white body cells.

function: Apply a consistent white background throughout the entire website interface.
static_description: Entire webpage uses solid white (#FFFFFF) as base background color across all views and components.

resource_dependency.componentColorPalette: Define CSS variable '--navy': #001F54 used for buttons, links, icons, headings, and other interactive elements.

function: Ensure all interactive components use navy as the primary accent color.
static_description: Buttons, navigation bars, icons, and highlighted text utilize navy blue (#001F54) consistently across the site while maintaining contrast against the white backdrop.

function: Present a clear and accessible method for users to enter stock identifiers.
static_description: Text input field with navy border and label above reading 'Enter Stock Code or Name'. Adjacent submit button labeled 'Search Stock' also in navy style.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the 'Search Stock' button triggers validation and submission of the entered value for lookup.

resource_dependency.parameterControlTypes: { Time Range: ['1 Month','3 Months','YTD','1 Year'] }, { Metrics: ['Price','Volume','P/E Ratio'] }, { Indices: ['S&P 500','Dow Jones'] }

function: Offer adjustable settings allowing fine-grained control over report contents.
static_description: Collapsible panels or tabs grouping related parameter sets like Time Range, Metrics, and Comparison Indices. Each group includes appropriate controls (radio buttons, dropdowns, etc.) styled in navy theme.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking panel headers expands/collapses each parameter group for better organization.

resource_dependency.reportCompilerService: Internal logic or microservice responsible for collecting selected data segments and formatting them according to the chosen template before export.

function: Compile requested data into downloadable reports automatically upon user request.
static_description: Invisible process running server-side; visually represented by a spinning loader animation displayed temporarily during report creation phase.

interaction_and_states.description: Initiating report generation starts this automated workflow and shows temporary status feedback via spinner animation.

resource_dependency.stockMarketDataProviderAPI: Third-party finance API offering real-time and historical stock data feeds including pricing, fundamentals, news, and metadata.
resource_dependency.dataAggregationLogic: Backend script or service aggregating raw feed inputs into normalized structures suitable for frontend consumption and storage.

function: Collect and normalize live and archived stock market data sourced externally.
static_description: No direct UI element; acts as underlying infrastructure ensuring timely delivery of accurate financial datasets to populate various features.

resource_dependency.downloadHandlerScript: Client-side JavaScript handling blob creation and browser-native file saving mechanisms for each supported format.

function: Allow users to save generated reports locally in their preferred digital format.
static_description: Download buttons positioned beneath completed report preview, each featuring distinct icon representing file type (PDF/DOCX/HTML) and navy-styled appearance.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking any download button triggers immediate client-side generation and prompt-based saving of the full report in that format.
